meanings.definition: A particular philosophy of life or conception of the world.
meanings.sent1: Her worldviews shaped her decisions and beliefs.
meanings.sent3: His quirky worldviews always made us smile.
meanings.sent4: In his worldviews, the universe was a grand puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's worldviews made the class discussions fascinating.

meanings.definition: The way in which someone sees and interprets the world.
meanings.sent1: Their worldviews influenced their perception of reality.
meanings.sent2: People with positive worldviews tend to be happier.
meanings.sent3: The cat's curious worldviews on life amused the family.
meanings.sent4: Through her worldviews, she saw the world as a canvas.
meanings.sent5: His optimistic worldviews brightened everyone's day.
